memberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

busiType = #{busitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intime = #{intime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yw_accesslog set memberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clientIP = #{clientip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, httpMethod = #{httpmethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, requestURL = #{requesturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, queryString = #{querystring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userAgent = #{useragent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, execTime = #{exectime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, busiType = #{busitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intime = #{intime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id,memberid,a.clientIP,a.httpMethod,a.requestURL,a.queryString,a.userAgent,a.busiType,a.intime,au.username AS nickname FROM yw_accesslog a INNER JOIN yw_admin_user au ON au.id = a.memberId
memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
